overview: Juho Taiwan works as a mechanic at a workshop belonging to the local motorsport club. He has a secret affair with one of the clients to Miss Chung, whenever Juho feels needy he calls her. Chung always tries to get a democratic excuse to repair her vehicle, but the fact that in the end, she tires of this anonymity and decides to stop, to make Juho take over his secret romance, under the threat of leaving him.
title: If you want to go eat
